problem.markdown:
1. In the experiment we have seen graphs where in the Y-axis there is "Milli-degrees". It is a measurement of ____________ ? () angle of rotation () Specific rotation (x) Ellipticity () None of the above are correct
2. CONTIN is __________ based process of deconvolution. () Linear regression. (x) Ridge Regression. () Neural network. () None of the above are correct
3. Which one of the following is a Neural Network based method of Deconvolution? () CONTIN. (x) K2D. () SVD. () All of the above are correct
4. If alpha helical and beta sheet regions occur in independent regions of a protein molecule, it will be counted under _______________ class. (x) Alpha + Beta. () Alpha/Beta. () All alpha. () None of the above are correct.
5. Ribonuclease A is an example of _______________ class. () All alpha. (x) Alpha + beta. () Alpha/beta. () Alpha - beta
problem.p: 1. In the experiment we have seen graphs where in the Y-axis there is "Milli-degrees". It is a measurement of ____________ ?

choicegroup.choice: None of the above are correct

problem.p: 2. CONTIN is __________ based process of deconvolution.

choicegroup.choice: None of the above are correct

problem.p: 3. Which one of the following is a Neural Network based method of Deconvolution?

choicegroup.choice: All of the above are correct

problem.p: 4. If alpha helical and beta sheet regions occur in independent regions of a protein molecule, it will be counted under _______________ class.

choicegroup.choice: None of the above are correct.

problem.p: 5. Ribonuclease A is an example of _______________ class.
